verses.roman:
eka vatsara teṅho prathama ekeśvara
prabhu dekhibāre āilā utkaṇṭhā-antara

synonyms: eka vatsara—one year; teṅho—Śrīkānta Sena; prathama—first; ekeśvara—alone; prabhu dekhibāre—to see the Lord; āilā—came; utkaṇṭhā-antara—with great anxiety in the mind.
translation: One year, Śrīkānta Sena came alone to Jagannātha Purī in great eagerness to see the Lord.
